channel.title: Should we be allowed to have sex, with tables?
channel.description: Kay, you can stop posting in this shit now.

item.title: Should we be allowed to have sex, with tables?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“counterp4545, post:1, topic:210242”]LULS![br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2008, 08:09:12 PM[/size][hr][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=260006.msg2157987#msg2157987 date=1207269020]

Of course, as long as we do it descreatly.

Of course, as long as we do it discreetly.

I concur this is definately infringing on our human rights.

I concur; this is definitely infringing on our human rights.

Thank you darling.
[/quote][quote author=Grammar Nazi link=topic=260006.msg2157976#msg2157976 date=1207268869]

Of course, as long as we do it descreatly.

Of course, as long as we do it discreetly.

I concur this is definately infringing on our human rights.

I concur; this is definitely infringing on our human rights.
[/quote]

More like grammar whore[/quote]

Why don’t you shut the fuck up? Oh wow, looks like someone did that for you.

item.title: Should we be allowed to have sex, with tables?
item.dc:creator: @Modest_Mouse Modest Mouse
item.description:
@Modest_Mouse wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:55, topic:195533”][quote author=Modest Mouse link=topic=260006.msg2216557#msg2216557 date=1210218656]

I concur: this is definitely infringing on our human rights.

Your choice of colon was completely arbitrary. It is not more right than a semicolon.

How would a semicolon be appropriate in this situation? It’s not standing in for a contraction.
[/quote]

It’s combining two otherwise near-fragmented sentences, whereas a colon represents the start of an informal list and hence would not be appropriate in that sentence.

The semicolon is correct here.[/quote]

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:56, topic:195533”][quote author=Modest Mouse link=topic=260006.msg2216557#msg2216557 date=1210218656]
How would a semicolon be appropriate in this situation? It’s not standing in for a contraction.
[/quote]

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Semicolon[/quote]

Touché.
I seem to have forgotten my grammar lessons.
How humbling.

Read full topic
item.source: Should we be allowed to have sex, with tables?

item.title: Should we be allowed to have sex, with tables?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Modest Mouse:

How would a semicolon be appropriate in this situation? It’s not standing in for a contraction.

en.wikipedia.org

Semicolon

؋ ​₳ ​ ฿ ​₿ ​ ₵ ​¢ ​₡ ​₢ ​ $ ​₫ ​₯ ​֏ ​ ₠ ​€ ​ ƒ ​₣ ​ ₲ ​ ₴ ​ ₭ ​ ₺ ​₾ ​ ₼ ​ℳ ​₥ ​ ₦ ​ ₧ ​₱ ​₰ ​£ ​ 元 圆 圓 ​﷼ ​៛ ​₽ ​₹ ₨ ​ ₪ ​ ৳ ​₸ ​₮ ​ ₩ ​ ¥ ​円 The semicolon or semi colon (;) is a punctuation mark that separates major sentence elements. A semicolon can be used between two closely related independent clauses, provided they are not already joined by a coordinating conjunction. Semicolons can also be used in place of commas to separate items in a list, particularly when the elements of that list ...

Read full topic

[/quote]
